nodes.text: Rabid Jotaz was a diseased jotaz that resided amongst the wreckage of a Venator-class Star Destroyer on Zeffo.

In 14 BBY the Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis encountered the sick jotaz while exploring the Crash Site of the Venator-class Star Destroyer during his secret mission to rebuild the Jedi Order. When the rabid jotaz attacked, Kestis fought and killed the beast.
